title: Ebert & Roeper - 06.15.08 - guest host Michael Phillips
description:
Ebert & Roeper  -  June 15th, 2008 - with guest host [url=http://www.chicagotribune.com/features/chi-michaelphillipscritic,1,931773.storygallery?coll=chi-entertainment-utl]Michael Phillips[/url], film critic for the Chicago Tribune

---- New movies this week:
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0800080/]The Incredible Hulk[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0803057/]The Promotion[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0960144/]You Don&#039;t Mess with the Zohan[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0949731/]The Happening[/url]
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0923600/]Baghead[/url]

	--- Next Week

		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0910970/]WALLÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â·E[/url]

-------------------------------------------------
SPOILERS - The following list gives the thumbs up or thumbs down vote which the movies received.  (Phillips - Roeper)
-------------------------------------------------

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0800080/]The Incredible Hulk[/url]  -  up - up
-- Edward Norton - Liv Tyler - Tim Roth - William Hurt

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0803057/]The Promotion[/url]  -  up (with asterisk) - up
-- written & directed by Steve Conrad - ( The Pursuit of Happyness - The Weather Man )
-- Seann William Scott - John C. Reilly - Jenna Fischer

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0960144/]You Don&#039;t Mess with the Zohan[/url]  -  up (rent) - down
-- Adam Sandler - Emmanuelle Chriqui - Rob Schneider

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0949731/]The Happening[/url]  -  down - up
-- directed by M. Night Shyamalan
-- Mark Wahlberg - Zooey Deschanel - John Leguizamo

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0923600/]Baghead[/url]  -  up - up
-- comedy horror

	--- Take 2
		Jack Black speaks about Kung Fu Panda and healing

	---Thumbs Up Video
		--Phillips:
			[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0796307/]Under the Same Moon[/url]  -  2007  -  [url=http://www.amazon.com/Under-Same-Moon-Kate-Castillo/dp/B00180IPM6/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=dvd&qid=1213653763&sr=1-1](amazon)[/url]
		--Roeper:

	---NEW ON VIDEO
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0770752/]Fool&#039;s Gold[/url]  -  (way) down - (way) down
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0460745/]Chaos Theory[/url]  -  (mild) up - (ridiculous) down
		[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0799934/]Be Kind Rewind[/url]  -  (not quite) down - up

	---Roeper&#039;s Three to See (favorite movies currently in theaters)
